bossDialog: Beat.. you.. and... beat.. you.. AND BEAT YOU AND BEAT YOU AND BEAT YOU! Until.. there's... NOTHING LEFT!!!
Rip.. your.. fingers.. RIGHT OFF! Eat.. them.. UP!!! GRRRR!!!!
Tear.. out.. YOUR HEART! THROW IT.. on.. THE GROUND! Stomp.. on.. it.. OVER AND OVER AND OVER!!

master.dialog: Ghouls love to chew on feet. It's certainly a strange fetish, but it does have its uses in battle, believe it or not. Take off your shoes and let's fight!
master.name: Glokta

name: Ghoul
